Title: C++/WinRT performance trap: Switching to Windows Runtime too soon - The Old New Thing
Description: Stay in the devirtualized world until you are forced to leave.

Title: Lightweight In-Memory Message Bus Using .NET Channels
Description: Suppose you're building a modular monolith, a type of software architecture where different components are organized into loosely coupled modules. Or you might need to process data asynchronously. You'll need a tool or service that allows you to implement this.
